alert.note: Alert for Laurel; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 11:14PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ROCKCASTLE AND LAUREL COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1113 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Gum Sulphur to Hazel Patch and moving southeast at 20 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... London, Sand Springs, Wood Creek Lake, Pongo, Quail, Maretburg, Ottowa, Hare, Spiro, Bernstadt, Wabp, Hansford, Willailla, Bromo, Luner, Carmichael, Sublimity City, Level Green, London-Corbin Airport and East Bernstadt. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Interstate 75 in east central Kentucky between mile markers 37 and 52. Kentucky Highway 80 in Laurel County between mile markers 4 and 11. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
